name: PILOTS, GHOSTS AND TROPHIES
description:
PILOTS,  GHOSTS AND TROPHIES  is a game of type PLATFORMER with the main character an acrobatic pilot with the name Gregoa. In one day he was exercising with his plane when suddenly a very suspicious storm appeared in front of him.  After entering the suspicious storm he crashes on an island. His plane is completely destroyed.  He then gets the propellers from the plane and start fighting with ghosts. And here starts he' s adventure...

CONTROLS:

MOVEMENT  —  PLAYER

W - jump

A -left

D - right

MOVEMENT  —  PLANE

W - up

S -down

A - left

D - right
